alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 1:43PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of West Feliciana, north central West Baton Rouge, central Pointe Coupee, central East Feliciana and northwestern East Baton Rouge Parishes, Wilkinson and western Amite Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 143 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Batchelor, or 11 miles northeast of Bayou Current, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zachary, New Roads, Jackson, St. Francisville, Clinton, Liberty, Centreville, Woodville, Slaughter, Gloster, Morganza, Wilson, Norwood, Wakefield, Smithdale, Spillman, Batchelor, Lettsworth, Fort Adams and Dolorosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana
